        @NotNull
public ItemStack apply​(@NotNull
                       ItemStack item,
                       int newAmount)
        Description copied from class: StackingRule
        Changes the size of the ItemStack to newAmount. At this point we know that the item can have this stack size applied.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        newAmount - the new item size

      • getAmount

        public int getAmount​(@NotNull

        Returns:
